title: The Last Dragon of the North
description: "A hard hitting adventure! One rousing dragon-fighting story, with a thin slice of romance along the way." -- Piers Anthony Owain Armstrong has been hired to hunt down a red dragon that is killing livestock across Wiltshire . The only evidence is a bloody patch on the ground and the head of the dead animal. Owain begins to track this nocturnal predator when news of another dragon comes - a much bigger dragon. During his journey, Owain meets up with the famous dragonslayers of the Northern Katja is a beautiful blonde with a deadly crossbow; Erik, a massive man that is short in temper but eager to fight; Lars. a man who is equally as cunning as he is strong and Edlund, their leader. When meeting Owain, the band of weary slayers long had been on a long quest to kill the last dragon of the north. But then word comes to them from the Green Dragon Inn about a monster - another dragon - lives inside the neighboring mountains.
author: Tony Chandler
